```{r}
source("CD_Processing.R")
library("plotly")
source("drawEmb.R")
```

```{r}
dataList <- CD_In(directory = "JIM767_15Corrected/", AuxInfo = F, TIME = F, prefix = "")
```
```{r}
time = 139
datPlot <- dataList[["CD"]][[7]]
#dataList15 <- CD_In(directory = "JIM767_15/")
#dat15<-dataList15[["CD"]][["20241022_JIM767_15_L1"]]
```

```
plottedExp <- drawEmbExp(datPlot, time, 
                        lineages = list("MSa","MSp","E"), 
                        symbols = list("diamond", "circle", "cross"), 
                        maxBlot = 16000, minBlot = 200, 
                        colorScheme = "blackOrange", 
                        ReporterForAll = T)
plottedExp[1]
```
```{r}
plottedLine <- drawEmbLine(
  datPlot, time, 
  lineages = list("MSaa", "MSap","MSpa", "MSpp", "C", "E"),
  colors = list(rgb(1,1,0), rgb(0,1,0), rgb(1,0,1), rgb(0,0,1), rgb(0.5,0,1), rgb(1,0,0)),
  opacitys = list(1,1,1,1,0.4,0.6),otherOpacity = 0.2,
  showAxis = T)
plottedLine[[1]]
```
